kesewethath, ema kalasimawa, kalpitha saha anagathawachaka kalayak wiya. 1857 wasarehi maha karallen pasuwa brithanyayanta erehiwa satan kirimata pahalawu palamuwana indiyanu nayakaya dutu agnidiga aasiyawe bohodenek owunge wirayage abhawaya wishwasa kirimata pakilunaha. 1945 aga bhagaya wana wita sama thana pathira giya katakathawak wuye bos anathuren diwi galawa gath bawath, nidahasa sandaha awasan aragalaya diyath karanu was sangi thanin paminimata kal yal balamin sitina bawathya."

sagarawa ta wasarak pirima nimiththen kolambaa hiltan hotalaye pawathi sanwadathmaka warshapurnaya samajaye me wanawita sakachjawata lakwa pawathina deshapalana, aarthika ha samajiya karana sambandhawa saha dewasaraka yahapalanaya saha ehi heta dawasa yanuwen sakachjawak pawathwiya.me sandaha mahacharya rohan samarajiwa, mahacharya sirimal aberathna,acharya dayan jayathilaka saha wiktar ayiwan saha imitiyas bakir makar wenuwata hadisi kandawimakin pamina sitiye suren ragawanya.

eyin depaththata dedaha – dedaha ithiri kalama, ithiri pramanaya (4, 000) thula gini guliyaka swabhawayak (ehi mada) pawathinawa.
silaya kiyanne aagam apata penwa di athi jiwitha ka්ramaya, jiwath wiya yuthu aakaraya, budunuwata pansal, kithunuwata dasapanatha, islam bhakthikayata pancha wagakim.
aagama, jathiya kumak wuwath purawasiyan washayen thrasthawadaya awasan kirimata wachanayakin ho dayakathwaya laba nodunna nam ee jaya athkara ganimata nohaki wanu athi bawa amuthuwen nokiwamanaya.
ohema kiyanna nuwara, kolambaa hari kurunagala wage palathaka ee palathen godak dura gihilla jiwath wena minissu kidenada inne kiyala.
